comment: This single barrel release from 2016 was finished in ex-White Port barrels from the Carcavelos region of Portugal after 12 years in ex-bourbon casks. Teeling claims this finish was a first for any whiskey and it sets a great precedent. It’s sweet and spicy, with notes of hot peppers and an aftertaste of white grapes.

Drammers online pour. Really good. 

Nose: Flowers, White Chocolate, Honey, Grass, Raisins, Sultanas, Vanilla, Lemon Cake, Butter Frosting, Orange, Apricot, Buttery Cookies

Palate: Vanilla, White Chocolate, Raisins, Honey, Caramel, Pears, Pepper, Oak, Flowers, Citrus, Pineapple, Passion Fruit, Papaya, Mango

Finish: Raisins, Flowers, Pepper, Cinnamom, Cloves, Milk Chocolate, Ginger, White Chocolate, Cherry
Of the Teeling family, this is the best I’ve had. Strong black liquorish and spice.
